data.title: Nick Jonas makes a cameo in Priyanka Chopra's film Love Again
data.meta_description:
Jim Strouse’s directorial Love Again is a romantic drama film. The film stars Priyanka Chopra and Sam Heughan in the lead role. Their chemistry has created a lot of excitement. Celine Dion, who is also starring in Love Again has released a song and the lyrical music video of the song is officially out. Check […]
 - TheDailyGuardian
data.text:
Jim Strouse’s directorial Love Again is a romantic drama film. The film stars Priyanka Chopra and Sam Heughan in the lead role. Their chemistry has created a lot of excitement. Celine Dion, who is also starring in Love Again has released a song and the lyrical music video of the song is officially out.

Check out the video below

Celine Dion said in a statement, “I had a lot of fun doing this movie. And to have the privilege of appearing with the beautiful and talented actors Priyanka Chopra Jonas and Sam Heughan in my very first feature film is a gift that I will cherish forever.” Further, she added, “I think it’s a wonderful feel-good story, and I hope that people will like it, and like the new songs too.”

Love Again marks Celine Dion’s debut as an actor. She is already known for delivering powerful love ballads in films, her greatest including My Heart Will Go On in the classic Titanic. The film is ready to hit the big screens on May 12 this year. It also stars Steve Oram, Russell Tovey, Omid Djalili, Sofia Barclay, Arinze Kene, and Celia Imrie in key roles.
